channel.title: Used King's power at the last possible second
channel.description:
I was a king and i wanted to use my "Allies" power. I did it at the exact last second of the night, but i had no feedback on my action. I got my power charge back tho.
it should have told me the faction of my target, and consume one charge of my power.
Use the king's power at the very last second. Maybe it's not exclusive to the king class.

item.title: Used King's power at the last possible second
item.dc:creator: Moleland
item.description:
As @RopeStringFace has also told you, there is no bug. The game didn’t receive your action in time. That’s it. Using your car analogy, that’s like complaining that because you slammed on the breaks before a crash, the car is defective because it didn’t stop in time.
